1.speaker: A
sentence: Why are you in a hurry? Just slow down.
왜 이렇게 너 바뻐? 천천히 좀 해.

2.speaker: B
sentence: I can't wait to get married and live with you.
난 기다릴 수 없어 결혼하는걸 그리고 너와 사는걸.

3.speaker: A
sentence: Just because we go out doesn't mean we have to get married.
우리가 사귄다고 해서 결혼해야 하는건 아니잖아요.

4.speaker: B
sentence: I see what you mean. take whatever time you need.
알겠어 너가 의미하는 걸. 시간을 충분히 가져요.

6.speaker: B
sentence: People say that we're a good match.
